benifits.title: MSME Knowledge Bank
benifits.subtitle: Founded in 2003, MSME Knowledge Bank is a joint venture by IIA and SIDBI to provide guidance on how to establish and run MSMEs.

benifits.title: IIA Mart
benifits.subtitle: An online marketplace for MSMEs to buy and sell products online.

benifits.title: Enterprise Growth Assistance
benifits.subtitle: IIA facilitates growth of its members through various channels- such as contact sharing through its directory (available on website and playstore), National & International Exhibitions, Buyer Seller Meets and events.

benifits.title: IIA News Magazine
benifits.subtitle: Free Monthly News Bulletin comprising useful information is made available to all IIA members.

benifits.title: Certificate of Origin
benifits.subtitle: Authorised by DGFT- Govt. of India, IIA provides Certificate of Origin to its members at concessional rates at its Lucknow and Delhi offices.

benifits.title: Privilege Card Facility to Avail Offers
benifits.subtitle: IIA members can avail various discounts and offers at Hospitals, Pathologies, Hotels, Restaurants, Industrial and Household Products, etc. using their IIA Privilege Card.

benifits.title: Expert Advisors/Consultants
benifits.subtitle: IIA members can reach out to various Subject Committees and affiliate Expert Advisors/Consultants listed on the website based on their requirements.

benifits.title: Q&A and Problem Resolution
benifits.subtitle: Online facility for all IIA members to resolve various problems.

benifits.title: Policy Advocacy with Centre and State Govts.
benifits.subtitle: Based on issues raised by its members, IIA actively advocates for policy changes with State and Central Governments.

benifits.title: IIA HelpDesk
benifits.subtitle: IIA has established a Helpdesk in its Central Office for support related to different subjects and industrial sectors.
